item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260110.3)
item.description:
What's New

Fix Telex diacritic marks for words with 'y' vowel

  • Remove 'y' from impossible consonant prefixes since 'y' is a VOWEL in Vietnamese

- Excluded: dy, gy, hy, ky, ly, my, ny, py, ry, ty, vy, xy (e.g., sỹ, lỹ, mỹ, tỷ, ký, hỷ)

- Also excluded: yl, yr, yw (y+L/R/W clusters are valid: vowel + consonant)

  • Exclude Telex double consonant patterns from English detection

- dd→đ, cc→ch, gg→gi, kk→kh, nn→ng, pp→ph, tt→th (valid Telex)

  • Exclude Telex vowel patterns: oo→ô, ee→ê (valid input)
  • Remove 'ly' from English suffixes to avoid conflict with 'lý'
  • Add explanatory comments for all exclusions

This allows users to properly type Vietnamese words like 'sỹ' (syx), 'lỹ' (lyx), 'ỷ' (yr), etc. using Telex input method
